description: Reuniting the franchise`s iconic characters, Dragon Ball Super will follow the aftermath of Goku`s fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth`s fragile peace.

REGULAR.description:
After Son Gokuu defeated the dangerous Majin Buu, peace has returned to Earth once again. Chichi wants Gokuu to get a job, so he works as a farmer. Son Goten and his friend Trunks search for a gift for Videl, soon to be his sister-in-law when his older brother, Son Gohan, is engaged to her. First, they decide on rings, then they decide on make-up, but unable to afford any, head for the hot springs in the woods to bottle some mineral water instead. While there, they are attacked by a giant snake, which they manage to scare away. For his purported role in saving Earth from Majin Buu, Mr. Satan has been awarded with 100 million Zeni that he does not want. He decides to give the money to one of the fighters; namely Gokuu. Gokuu gives the money to Chichi, so she would let him train. Meanwhile, somewhere in the depths of space, Beerus, the God of Destruction, has awakened from his slumber. Keen on battling the worthy opponent that appeared to him in his visions, Beerus and his attendant Whis set out to discover who this opponent is.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Die Belohnung für den Frieden – Wer erhält die 100 Millionen Zeni?
Heiwa no Houshuu 1-oku Zeni wa Dare no Te ni!?
The Peace Reward: Who Will Get the 100 Million Zeni!?
¡El Gran Premio de la Paz! ¿Quién se llevará los 100 millones de Zenís?
¡El Premio Mundial de la Paz! ¿Quién se quedará con los 100 millones de Zenis?
平和の報酬1億ゼニーは誰の手に!?

REGULAR.description:
Son Gokuu goes to Planet Kaiou to train with Kaiou-sama. Meanwhile, Vegeta, Bulma, and Trunks take a family trip to a resort. Bulma and Trunks are enjoying the family time together while Vegeta is bothered by the fact that Gokuu gets to train. Fed up with what he considers a waste of time, Vegeta flies away and heads back to the Capsule Corporation to train. Somewhere in space, Beerus and Whis scour an alien planet in search of dinosaur meat. They are confronted by the planet`s strongest dweller, but he proves to be no match for them. Shortly afterwards, Beerus destroys the planet in order to have another vision of his destined opponent – the Super Saiyan God.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Auf in den Ferienort! – Vegeta macht einen Familienausflug?
El Paraíso Prometido ¿¡Vegeta en unas Vacaciones en Familia!?
To the Promised Resort! Vegeta Goes on a Family Trip?!
Yakusoku no Resort e! Vegeta ga Kazoku Ryokou!?
¡Vacaciones en un resort! ¿Vegeta irá a un viaje familiar?
約束のリゾートへ! べジータが家族旅行!?

REGULAR.description:
Fearing what might happen knowing that the God of Destruction is awake, the Kaioushin urge Kaiou-sama to ensure that Son Gokuu never finds out about Beerus. However, Gokuu overhears the conversation and becomes curious. Back in his temple, Beerus and Whis continue their search for the Super Saiyan God. They soon learn of Son Gokuu and his feats and decide to pay him and Kaiou-sama a visit. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Gokuu`s friends and family members begin gathering on the cruise ship for Bulma`s birthday party except for Vegeta who is still training to overpower Gokuu and everyone else in the Universe.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Where`s the Rest of the Dream?! In Search of the Super Saiyan God!
Wie geht der Traum weiter? – Finde den Super-Saiyajin-Gott!
Yume no Tsuzuki wa Doko Da!? Super Saiyajin God o Sagase!
¿Cómo continúa el Sueño? ¡En Busca del Super Saiyan Dios!
¿En dónde está la otra mitad del sueño? ¡Buscando al Súper Saiyajin Fase Dios!
夢の続きはどこだ!? 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドを探せ!

REGULAR.description:
With all guests now gathered, except for Son Gokuu and Vegeta, Bulma`s birthday party gets underway. Trunks shows Son Goten where his mother hid the bingo tournament grand prize – the Dragon Balls. Not far off from the ship, Pilaf Gang, now poor and hungry, are trying to get by until they find the Dragon Balls and make their wishes come true. When his Dragon Radar picks up a signal coming from Bulma`s ship, Pilaf and his henchmen hastily board the ship, with Trunks and Goten`s help. Meanwhile, on his planet, Kaiou-sama explains to Gokuu who and what Beerus exactly is and that for every benevolent God there must be a malevolent one in order to keep the Universe in balance. Just as he finishes, Beerus and Whis arrive.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Aim for the Dragon Balls! Pilaf Gang in Action!
Hol dir die Dragonballs! – Pilaf und seine Bande haben einen Plan!
Mezase Dragon Ball! Pilaf Ichimi no Daisakusen!
目指せドラゴンボール! ピラフ一味の大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Beerus and Whis arrive on Kaiou-sama`s planet and detect Gokuu`s presence. While he is initially disappointed that Gokuu does not know what a "Super Saiyan God" is, he agrees to test his strength in a sparring match. Gokuu attempts to fight him in all of the Super Saiyan transformations but is outclassed every time. Beerus and Whis head for Earth shortly afterwards while Kaiou-sama uses his telepathy to warn Vegeta ahead of their arrival.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Entscheidungskampf auf Meister Kaios Planet! – Goku gegen Beerus!
Kaiousei no Kessen! Gokuu tai Hakaishin Beerus
The Ultimate Fight on King Kai`s Planet! Goku vs the God of Destruction Beerus
界王星の決戦! 悟空VS[たい]破壊神ビルス

REGULAR.description:
Beerus and Whis arrive on Earth, where Bulma`s birthday party is underway. Initially, Vegeta is paralyzed by Beerus` presence. He recalls a childhood encounter with the deity a long time ago when Beerus visited Planet Vegeta and threatened his father, King Vegeta. Shortly after, Bulma pops up. She invites Beerus and Whis to join the party. Beerus gladly accepts her offer and enjoys the food available. The two start mingling with the other guests, while Vegeta tries his best to ensure that Beerus remains calm. Whis soon learns of pudding, which he finds to be extraordinary delicious; so much so that he urges Beerus to have some too. It turns out that Majin Buu had taken the remaining pudding cups for himself and refuses to share. Angered by Majin Buu`s insolence, Beerus attacks him.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Don`t Anger the God of Destruction! Excitement at the Birthday Party
Hakaishin o Okoraseruna! Dokidoki Tanjou Party
Verärgere nicht den Gott der Zerstörung! – Eine aufregende Geburtstagsparty!
破壊神を怒らせるな! ドキドキ誕生パーティー

REGULAR.description:
Beerus effortlessly disposes of Majin Buu, while Vegeta stands by in awe. Vegeta tries to persuade Beerus to calm down and enjoy himself, but he refuses to listen. Trunks and Goten fuse into Gotenks and attack to no avail. Powerless to do anything else, Gotenks starts insulting Beerus for which he is promptly punished. Piccolo, Tenshinhan, and Android 18 try taking on Beerus with little success. Majin Buu attacks again but is unable to land a single hit. While observing the battle, Dende realizes what Beerus actually is and immediately informs Piccolo. Before Piccolo is able to warn him, Gohan powers up and charges towards Beerus. Using Majin Buu as a weapon, Beerus repels Gohan, taking them both out. Being the last one standing, Vegeta confronts Beerus, but he is swiftly brought to the ground. Beerus tells Vegeta that he is disappointed with him; that he is just as weak as his father was. Just as Beerus is about to finish Vegeta, Bulma walks up and slaps him for ruining her party. Beerus retaliates in similar fashion. Seeing Bulma struck infuriates Vegeta; he explodes and powers up immensely.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Finger weg von meiner Bulma! – Führt Vegetas Zorn zur Transformation?
How Dare You Hurt My Bulma! Vegeta`s Sudden, Angry Shift?!
Yokumo Ore no Bulma o! Vegeta Ikari no Totsuzen Hen`i!?
よくもオレのブルマを! ベジータ怒りの突然変異!?

REGULAR.description:
Having powered up, Vegeta charges towards Beerus. He manages to land a few punches before Beerus, who was using only a fraction of his power, knocks him out. Just as he is about to destroy Earth, Beerus has a sudden idea. He decides to give the Earthlings another chance at saving Earth. Meanwhile, fearing for their lives, Pilaf Gang disembark Bulma`s ship on a rowboat and sail away. Thinking he is the same as Majin Buu because of his pink hue, Beerus picks Oolong out of the crowd and challenges him to a game of janken (じゃんけん) to decide the fate of Earth. Oolong manages to draw twice, but Beerus eventually wins and proceeds to power up his attack. Just as Beerus is about to fire, Gokuu chimes in saying he has thought of a way to find out about the Super Saiyan God – by summoning and asking Shenron.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Goku Arrives! A Last Chance from Beerus Sama?!
Goku trifft ein! – Meister Beerus gewährt eine letzte Chance?
Gokuu Kenzan! Beerus-sama kara no Last Chance!?
悟空見参! ビルス様からのラストチャンス!?

REGULAR.description:
Gokuu gathers the Dragon Balls together and summons Shenron who is startled by Beerus` presence. Shenron quickly explains that the Super Saiyan God is not a person but a legendary transformation that only kindhearted Saiyans can achieve by fusing their power together. The Saiyans attempt to transform Gokuu but fail, as they are one Saiyan short. Growing tired of waiting, Beerus starts preparing his attack to destroy the planet. Suddenly, Videl jumps in front of the Saiyans. She says that there is one more Saiyan who might be able to help them – her and Gohan`s unborn child. The Saiyans and Videl attempt the transformation again and manage to transform Gokuu into the Super Saiyan God.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Danke fürs warten, Beerus! – Ein Super-Saiyajin-Gott wird geboren!
Omatase, Beerus-sama: Tsui ni Super Saiyajin God Tanjou!
Sorry for the Wait, Beerus Sama. The Super Saiyan God Is Finally Born!
お待たせ, ビルス様 ついに超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッド誕生!

REGULAR.description:
Now a Super Saiyan God, Gokuu confronts Beerus. He is amazed by the immense power his body has gained with the transformation, so much so that he is initially unable to fully grasp its newfound potential. Fighting with Beerus, Gokuu manages to grow gradually into his new form. Seeing as how Gokuu might turn out to be a worthy adversary after all, Beerus decides it is time for them to unleash their true power and have a real battle of Gods.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Misero Gokuu! Super Saiyajin God no Power!!
Unleash It, Goku! The Power of the Super Saiyan God!!
Zeig sie uns, Goku! – Die Kraft des Super-Saiyajin-Gottes!
見せろ悟空! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドの力[パワー]!!

REGULAR.description:
Having somewhat got a grip on the Super Saiyan God form, Gokuu initially manages to keep up with Beerus, but he soon realizes that his opponent is still not fighting at his maximum. It is revealed that Beerus is doing so only to motivate Gokuu to catch up with him. To that end, Beerus drags Gokuu to space where he swiftly knocks him out. Gokuu comes crashing down back to Earth and ends up in an ocean. Amazed by such power, Gokuu gets excited and powers up, healing himself in the process. Willing to have another go, he flies out of the ocean and dashes towards Beerus.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Er geht weiter! – Der Kampf Gott gegen Gott!
Let`s Keep Going, Beerus Sama! Our Battle of Gods!
Tsuzukeyouze Beerus-sama! Kami to Kami no Tatakai o!
続けようぜビルス様! 神と神の戦いを!

REGULAR.description:
Gokuu and Beerus continue to fight in space. As both of them power up and clash, the universe begins to crumble under the power of the gods. Celestial bodies blow up due to the shockwaves. Meanwhile, Old Kaioushin reveals to the younger Kaioushin that with three more blows the whole universe would be destroyed along with Beerus and Gokuu. Gokuu, on landing the third clash with Beerus, unknowingly stops the universe`s collapse by balancing Beerus` attack with his own. Beerus gets enraged and uses his atomic bomb attack on Gokuu. Gokuu uses the Super Saiyan God energy to power up his Kamehameha attack to keep Beerus` attack at bay.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Das Universum zerfällt in Stücke! – Beim Kampf der Götter knallt es gewaltig!
The Universe Crumbles?! Clash! God of Destruction vs. Super Saiyan God!
Uchuu ga Kudakeru!? Gekitotsu! Hakaishin tai Super Saiyajin God!
宇宙が砕ける!? 激突! 破壊神VS[たい]超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッド!

REGULAR.description:
The Kaioushin are surprised that the Universe is still intact following the battle, but they fear the worst is still to come. On Earth, Vegeta, Whis, and the others are still standing by, watching the battle. Whis is surprised by the Super Saiyan God`s power and its ability to keep up with his trainee. In space, Gokuu struggles to keep up with Beerus` attack, which ultimately ends up in a massive explosion, blinding everyone on Earth. Shortly after, the light clears out, revealing everything to be as it was prior to the explosion. Beerus explains that he used his full power to negate the explosion, thereby saving the Universe. Seeing it as a perfect opportunity to boast, Mr. Satan arranges to have him be falsely credited with saving the planet yet again. Despite being at his limit, Gokuu remains calm, which annoys the God of Destruction. Beerus thinks Gokuu might have a strategy that he has been hiding which Gokuu promptly denies, saying that everything he had been doing was improvised as they fought. The Gods quickly power up and continue fighting, but this time, both at their limit. As soon as they start, Gokuu loses his Super Saiyan God aura and reverts to the ordinary Super Saiyan form. Upon noticing that, Beerus decides to quit, thinking it is pointless to fight an ordinary Saiyan. Gokuu, however, does not notice and keeps going at it. Able to sense Gokuu`s energy, Whis assumes that the battle has concluded and that Gokuu lost, but Piccolo begs to differ. Surprised that Gokuu is still able to hit him even after losing his God form, Beerus surmises that Gokuu`s body has adjusted to the Super Saiyan God power, making him stronger in his ordinary form. Gokuu proclaims that, with or without the Super Saiyan God form, it is still him that Beerus is up against, and the two resume their battle.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Goku, Surpass the Super Saiyan God!
Gokuu yo, Super Saiyajin God o Koeteyuke!
Los, Goku! – Übertriff den Super-Saiyajin-Gott!
悟空よ, 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ゴッドを超えてゆけ!

REGULAR.description:
Now with only a Super Saiyan form at his disposal, Gokuu powers up and attacks but to no avail as Beerus knocks him out effortlessly. With Gokuu knocked out, Beerus prepares to destroy Earth. In a final effort to stop Beerus, Gokuu once again powers up and charges his Kamehameha attack. Gokuu manages to prevent Beerus` attack, but he completely depletes what was left of his energy in the process. He comes crashing down to Earth onto Bulma`s ship, where Vegeta manages to catch him. Beerus lands on the planet shortly after to finish what he started, but he suddenly falls asleep. Whis explains that Gokuu must have tired Beerus out and that by the time he wakes up he will have forgotten about their trip to Earth. Beerus, who was faking his sudden sleep because humanity`s food convinced him to spare the planet, and Whis leave for Beerus` planet shortly after. With Earth safe again, Gokuu decides to relax and enjoy the party.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Das hier ist meine gesamte Kraft! – Der Kampf der Götter wird endlich entschieden!
Kore ga Ora no Arittake no Chikara Da! Kecchaku! Kami to Kami
This Is Every Ounce of Power I Have! The Battle of Gods` Conclusion!
これがオラのありったけの力だ! 決着! 神と神

REGULAR.description:
With Earth no longer in danger, Gokuu and the others return to their ordinary lives. Chichi orders Gokuu to leave training behind and find a job so he can support the family. Meanwhile, Mr. Satan`s self-promotion goes awry when a group of aliens land in the city. The aliens reveal that they are ambassadors who wish to thank and reward whoever defeated Beerus; thus protecting their planet from destruction. Before he is given the reward, however, Mr. Satan is asked to demonstrate his godlike power against the alien`s mightiest champion in a sparring match. Knowing that he does not stand a chance, Mr. Satan quickly scampers away to safety and calls for help, but no one answers him. Suddenly, Gokuu arrives at the scene in need of Mr. Satan`s help. Mr. Satan arranges to have Gokuu fight in his stead. Just before the fight, however, Gokuu spots Chichi and immediately runs away to avoid being scolded for disobeying her. Mr. Satan is left to confront the alien champion on his own. Suddenly, the aliens spot Mr. Satan`s dog and run away in fear. With the aliens gone, the crowd praises Mr. Satan, whom they think saved them and Earth yet again.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Make a Miracle, Satan the Hero! A Challenge from Outer Space
Unser Held, Mr. Satan! – Die Herausforderung aus dem Weltall!
Yuusha Satan yo Kiseki o Okose! Uchuu kara no Chousenjou
¡Héroe Satán! ¡Haz el milagro! ¡Un desafío desde el espacio exterior!
勇者サタンよ奇跡を起こせ! 宇宙からの挑戦状

REGULAR.description:
Chi-Chi still has Goku doing work out on the farm. Instead of working, however, Goku decides to rest and falls asleep. Krillin flies in and wakes up Goku. Krillin is very surprised to hear that Goku is still on Earth and not training with King Kai. He reminisces about his training with Goku under Kame-Sennin and the power level difference between them since they were children. Curious to see how large the gap is, Krillin tells Goku to punch him with all his power. Reluctant Goku tries to change Krillin`s mind, but Krillin insists. Goku obeys and punches Krillin, sending him flying into a boulder. Shortly afterwards, Goku heads home, while Android 18 attends to Krillin`s wounds. Krillin states that he misses martial arts and wishes to start training again. Meanwhile, Vegeta is seen in the wastelands standing determined. He states his intent to surpass Goku without the aid of others. Elsewhere, Whis and Bulma are having lunch together. Whis is enjoying all the food Bulma is having her chef make. While they dine, Bulma asks Whis to protect Earth from Beerus in case he ever shows up again. Vegeta arrives and sees Whis. He asks Whis to see Beerus, but Whis refuses to do so. Whis tells Vegeta that he is Beerus` teacher and that, with the proper tutelage, he could one day surpass Goku. Vegeta bows and kneels before Whis and begs to become his student. An unimpressed Whis walks past him. Vegeta decides to convince Whis by giving him the tastiest food on Earth. After several failed attempts, Vegeta finally impresses Whis with a cup of instant noodle. Before Vegeta heads off with Whis to Beerus` planet, Bulma hands him new armor. They arrive on Beerus` planet shortly afterwards and prepare to train.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Vegeta Becomes an Apprentice?! Winning Whis Over!
Vegeta ga Deshiiri!? Whis o Kouryaku Seyo!
Vegeta wird Schüler? – Bezwinge Whis!
¿¡Vegeta se convierte en un discípulo!? Conquista a Wiss
ベジータが弟子入り!? ウイスを攻略せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Pan has been born. While most of her family members and friends think that she should be taught martial arts, Chi-Chi is revolted by the very idea. She believes that Pan should be raised to be a lady and not a mindless fighter like her grandfather Goku. Everyone tries to persuade Chi-Chi to change her mind but to no avail. Bulma accidentally mentions that Vegeta has been away training with Whis for six months, which shocks Goku. After some time, Whis returns to Earth to enjoy more of the food Earth has to offer. Goku approaches Whis and asks to become his pupil. Whis accepts, thinking it is the perfect time for Goku to join Vegeta in training. Just as the two are about to depart, Chi-Chi runs up and stops Goku from leaving. Despite her wishes, Goku ends up leaving with Whis. Chi-Chi then has a sudden change of heart, saying that Goku will return once he gets hungry anyway.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Pan Is Born! And Goku Goes on a Training Trip?!
Pan Tanjou! Soshite Gokuu wa Shuugyou no Tabi e!?
Pans Geburt! – Goku macht eine Trainingsreise!
¡El nacimiento de Pan! ¿¡Y el viaje de entrenamiento de Gokú!?
パン誕生! そして悟空は修行の旅へ!?

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Whis arrive on Beerus` planet, where Vegeta is tasked with housekeeping. Goku is surprised to learn that Vegeta has gotten considerably stronger training under Whis and so wants to start his training right away. Before he is allowed to, however, Whis orders him to help Vegeta with the chores including changing Beerus` bed sheets without waking him up. Goku and Vegeta promptly do their chores and start their training with Whis. Whis` training routine quickly wears Goku out, and he falls asleep, while Vegeta, willing to surpass Goku at any cost, keeps on training. The next day, Whis decides to have a sparring match with his apprentices in order to gauge their speed. The two prove to be no match for Whis, being too slow to land a single hit. Meanwhile, somewhere in space, surviving members of Freeza`s army, led by Sorbet, continue with their effort of resurrecting their leader. Not far off, mysterious beings from a different Universe, known only as Shanpa and Vados, continue their search for Beerus.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: I`m Here, Too! Training Begins on Beerus` Planet!
Jetzt bin ich auch da! – Das Training auf Beerus` Planeten kann losgehen!
Ora mo Kita zo! Beerus-sei de Shuugyou Kaishi Da!
オラも来たぞ! ビルス星で修行開始だ!

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Vegeta continue their training under Whis on Beerus` planet. Meanwhile, Sorbet and his assistant Tagoma depart their ship and head for Earth in order to find the Dragon Balls, with which they intend to resurrect their leader Freeza. They run into the Pilaf Gang who had collected all seven Dragon Balls just before their arrival. Sorbet coerces Pilaf into summoning Shenlong. At first, Shenlong refuses to revive Freeza, seeing it as pointless given his current state – cut in pieces, just as he was when Future Trunks killed him. Tagoma suggests using their advanced healing technology to make Freeza intact again. Sorbet has Freeza resurrected, and they return to their ship. Freeza is completely renewed shortly afterwards.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Despair Rises! The Emperor of Evil, Frieza, Resurrected!
Erneute Verzweifelung! – Die Auferstehung des bösen Imperators!
Zetsubou Futatabi! Aku no Teiou - Freezer no Fukkatsu!
絶望ふたたび! 悪の帝王・フリーザの復活!

REGULAR.description:
Once restored, Freeza plans revenge against Goku and Future Trunks. Tagoma objects to Freeza`s plans, but Freeza promptly subdues him. When Freeza finds out that Goku has gotten much stronger since they last met, he decides to train in order to become more powerful. He reveals that, since his power was inborn, he had never felt the need to train a day in his life before now. Four months pass before Freeza and his army head for Earth. All the while, Goku and Vegeta continue their training under Whis. Jaco the Galactic Patrolman travels to Earth to inform Bulma that Freeza had been revived and that he will be approaching Earth shortly with an army of one thousand soldiers. With Freeza`s army fast approaching, Bulma gathers the remaining Z fighters to face Freeza`s army in hopes of holding out until Goku and Vegeta make it back to Earth.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Eine Warnung von Jaco! – Freezer und seine Soldaten rücken heran!
Jaco`s Warning! Frieza and His 1000 Troops Approach
Jako kara no Keikoku! Semarikuru Freezer to 1000 Nin no Heishi-tachi
ジャコからの警告! 迫り来るフリーザと1000人の兵士達

REGULAR.description:
Without any way to get a hold of Goku or Vegeta, only Gohan and the remaining Z fighters are ready to face Frieza. Up against 1000 troops and the emperor of evil, our heroes may face more of a challenge than expected!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Rache beginnt! – Gohan wird von Freezers Armee überrascht!
Fukushuu no Hajimari! Freezer-gun no Akui ga Gohan o Utsu!
The Start of Revenge! The Malice of Frieza Army Strikes Gohan!
復讐のはじまり! フリーザ軍の悪意が悟飯を撃つ!

REGULAR.description:
Tagoma proves to be a tough opponent and even Piccolo can’t take him. Gotenks joins the battle but suddenly Tagoma is taken over by…Ginyu?! Gohan is able to face him as a Super Saiyan but can he keep up when Frieza makes his move?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Change! An Unexpected Return! His Name Is Ginyu!!
Change! Masaka no Fukkatsu! Sono Na wa Ginyu!
Körpertausch! – Ginyus unerwartete Auferstehung!
チェーンジ! まさかの復活! その名はギニュー!!

REGULAR.description:
Piccolo falls after attempting to save Gohan but there’s no time to deal with the loss. While Bulma finally gets a message to Whis for Goku and Vegeta, Gohan powers up to his highest level. And so does Freiza. Will Goku make it in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikyuu ga! Gohan ga! Zettaizetsumei! Hayaku Kite Kure Son Gokuu!
Die Erde ... Gohan ... der sichere Tod ... Goku, komm schnell!
The Earth! Gohan! Absolute Peril! Hurry and Get Here, Son Goku!!
地球が! 悟飯が! 絶体絶命! 早く来てくれ孫悟空!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Frieza finally face off! With their powers matched, Frieza begins attacking Goku’s friends to catch him off guard. Frustrated, Vegeta pushes him to give it his all and face Frieza in his ultimate form!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Frieza vs Son Goku: This Is the Result of My Training!
Freezer und Goku stoßen aufeinander! – Das ist das Ergebnis meines Trainings!
Gekitotsu! Freeza tai Son Gokuu: Kore ga Ora no Shuugyou no Seika Da!
激突! フリーザVS[たい]孫悟空 これがオラの修行の成果だ!

REGULAR.description:
Not to be outdone by Goku’s new form, Frieza reveals a new one of his own. Once again the two face off in an evenly matched battle. Meanwhile, Beerus and Whis make their way to Earth but run into allies of their own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An All-Out Battle! The Revenge of Golden Frieza
Kampf mit voller Kraft! – Der goldende Freezer will Rache!
Zenkai Battle! Fukushuu no Golden Freeza
全開バトル! 復讐のゴールデンフリーザ

REGULAR.description:
Goku is having trouble facing Golden Frieza until he realizes the other is quickly losing stamina. Gaining the upper hand, Goku gives Frieza a chance to leave Earth for good. But the emperor of evil isn’t ready to give up his revenge just yet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Glint of Hope Shines Through in a Crisis! Time to Fight Back, Son Goku!
Dai Pinch ni Shouki ga Mieta! Hangeki Kaishi Da Son Gokuu
In größter Not sieht er seine Chance zum Sieg! – Auf zum Gegenangriff, Goku!
大ピンチに勝機が見えた! 反撃開始だ孫悟空!

REGULAR.description:
With Goku badly injured, Vegeta steps in to face Frieza. Stronger than ever, Vegeta proves to be a challenge and an enraged Frieza destroys the planet! Protected by Whis, the Z fighters are given a chance to save Earth, if they act fast enough.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikyuu Bakuhatsu!? Kecchaku no Kamehame Ha
Die Erde explodiert! – Die entscheidende Kamehameha!
The Earth Explodes?! The Deciding Kamehameha
地球爆発!? 決着のかめはめ波

REGULAR.description:
Vegeta and Goku are continuing their training under Whis when they receive a pair of visitors—Beerus’ brother and Whis’ sister! After a comparison of culinary delights, Champa challenges Beerus to a universe-versus-universe tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 6 Uchuu no Hakaijin: Sono Na wa Champa
Der Gott der Zerstörung des 6. Universums! – Sein Name ist Champa!
The God of Destruction from Universe 6: His Name Is Champa
第6宇宙の破壊神 その名はシャンパ

REGULAR.description:
Bulma suggests summoning Shenron to find the remaining Super Dragon Balls, but even his power is not enough. As they prepare for the upcoming match, Beerus reveals there’s a fighter stronger than Goku who’s going to join the team of the 7th Universe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakutou Shiai Kaisai Kettei! Shushou wa Gokuu yori mo Tsuyoi Yatsu
Kampfkunstturnier ist beschlossen! – Der Team-Captain ist stärker als Goku?
The Martial Arts Match Has Been Decided! The Team Captain Is Stronger Than Goku
格闘試合開催決定! 主将は悟空よりも強いヤツ

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Vegeta recruit Piccolo and Majin Buu as the remaining combatants of the Universe Seven team. Gohan considered joining the team, but he was unable to do so as he had a business meeting on the day of the tournament. Beerus and the others think back over recent events. A series of flashbacks recapping the series is shown.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: "Kakutou Shiai" e no Osarai: Nokori Futari no Member wa Dare Da!?
A Review Before the `Martial Arts Match`: Who Are the Last Two Members?!
Ein Rückblick, bevor der Wettkampf beginnt! – Wer sind die restlichen zwei Kämpfer?
『格闘試合』へのおさらい 残り二人のメンバーは誰だ!?

REGULAR.description:
To find out more about the Super Dragon Balls, Jaco takes Bulma to the all-knowing alien, Master Zuno. But their trip is disturbed when they encounter the criminal, Geppuman. They’re given three questions to ask Zuno—will they get the answers they need?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zu Meister Zuno! – Fragt nach dem Verbleib der Super Dragonballs!
Off to Zuno Sama`s! Find Out Where Super Dragon Balls Are!
Zunoo-sama no Moto e! Super Dragon Ball no Arika o Kikidase!
ズノー様のもとへ! 超ドラゴンボールのありかを聞き出せ!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time to head to the tournament! Everyone gathers, and the mysterious fighter Monaka is finally revealed. Once on the “Planet With No Name,” they size up their competition which includes…another Saiyan?! Are they ready for the ultimate tournament?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Wettkampf beginnt! – Alle auf zum Planeten ohne Namen!
Shiai Kaishi Da! Minna de "Namae no Nai Hoshi" e!
The Match Begins! Let`s All Go to the "Nameless Planet!"
試合開始だ! みんなで「名前のない星」へ!

REGULAR.description:
To find out more about the Super Dragon Balls, Jaco takes Bulma to the all-knowing alien, Master Zuno. But their trip is disturbed when they encounter the criminal, Geppuman. They’re given three questions to ask Zuno—will they get the answers they need?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Behold, Universe 6! This Is the Super Saiyan? Son Goku!
Odoroke Dai 6 Uchuu yo! Kore ga Super Saiyajin Son Gokuu Da!
Staune, 6. Universum! – Das ist Goku, der Super-Saiyajin!
驚け第6宇宙よ! これが超[スーパー]サイヤ人・孫悟空だ!

REGULAR.description:
After Goku’s sudden defeat, Piccolo steps into the ring! Frost continues to be a challenge, and right when Piccolo is beaten, Jaco makes a discovery—Frost hasn’t been fighting fair! But Vegeta’s not ready to let him off with a disqualification.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Piccolo gegen Frost! – Lege alles in die Höllenspirale!
Piccolo tai Frost: Makankousappou ni Subete o Kakero!
Piccolo vs. Frost: Put It All on the Special Beam Cannon!
ピッコロVS[たい]フロスト 魔貫光殺砲にすべてをかけろ!

REGULAR.description:
Vegeta prepares to face Frost, who has no intention of discontinuing his cheating. But with a single hit, Vegeta knocks Frost completely out of the ring for the win. Before the next round, Goku is added back to the lineup, and Champa adds a new rule.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikari o Chikara ni Kaero! Vegeta no Zenkai Battle
Turn Rage Into Strength! Vegeta`s Full-On Battle
Wandle den Zorn in Kraft um! – Vegeta kämpft mit Volldampf!
怒りを力に変えろ! ベジータの全開バトル

REGULAR.description:
The battle literally heats up as Magetta starts a heatwave. Cornered, Vegeta destroys the barrier around him and unleashes his power against his opponent. Will he bring this battle to a cool conclusion or melt under pressure?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Unexpected Desperate Battle! Vegeta`s Furious Explosion!
Ein Kampf, härter als gedacht! – Vegetas Riesenexplosion des Zorns!
Masaka no Daikusen! Vegeta Ikari no Daibakuhatsu!
まさかの大苦戦! ベジータ怒りの大爆発!

REGULAR.description:
It’s Saiyan versus Saiyan in this next epic battle! The two seem evenly matched until Vegeta demands Cabbe transform into a Super Saiyan, only to learn the boy is incapable. Will Vegeta show mercy, or has he strayed to his old, evil ways?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Forget Your Saiyan Pride! Vegeta vs the Saiyan of Universe 6
Saiyajin no Hokori o Wasurena! Vegeta tai Dai 6 Uchuu no Saiyajin
Vergiss nie deinen Saiyajin-Stolz! – Vegeta gegen den Saiyajin aus dem 6. Universum!
サイヤ人の誇りを忘れるな! ベジータVS[たい]第6宇宙のサイヤ人

REGULAR.description:
Vegeta goes up against the last member of the 6th Universe, the assassin Hit! With movements so fast nobody can even see him, Hit proves to be a true match for Vegeta. Will the prince of Saiyans finally fall?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 6 Uchuu Saikyou no Senshi! Koroshiya Hit Kenzan!!
Der stärkste Kämpfer des 6. Universums! – Die Audienz beim Auftragskiller Hit!
The Ultimate Warrior of Universe 6! Assassin Hit Appears!!
第6宇宙最強の戦士! 殺し屋ヒット見参!!

REGULAR.description:
Figuring out Hit’s “time-skipping” ability allows Goku to keep up—until Hit powers up! Will Goku finally face defeat, or does the Saiyan have a secret power of his own?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Gegenangriff auf den Zeitsprung? – Goku zeigt seine neue Technik!
Seichou Shita "Toki Tobashi" no Hangeki!? Deruka!? Gokuu no Arata na Waza!
The Advanced "Time-Skip" Fights Back?! Will It Come Forth? Goku`s New Technique!
成長した"時とばし"の反撃!? 出るか!? 悟空の新たな技!

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Hit continue to fight evenly matched as they reach unbelievable heights with their abilities. But as Goku continues to strain his body—he does the unthinkable! Will the 6th Universe be named the winners?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At Last, It Comes to an End! Is the Winner Beerus? Or Is It Champa?
Die Entscheidung naht! – Wer wird siegen, Beerus oder Champa?
Tsui ni Kecchaku! Shousha wa Beerus? Soretomo Champa?
ついに決着! 勝者はビルス? それともシャンパ?

REGULAR.description:
Before the winner can gloat, a newcomer appears in the ring! Beerus and Champa are struck with fear—just who is this Zeno? And finally, it’s time to make a wish on the Super Dragon Balls, that is, if they can find the last one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come, Dragon of the Gods: And Grant Me My Wish, Pretty Peas!
Erscheine, Gott der Drachen! – Und erfülle meinen Wunsch-Punsch!
Ide yo Kami no Ryuu: Soshite Negai o Kanaete Chonmage!
出でよ神の龍 そして願いを叶えてちょんまげ!

REGULAR.description:
Bulma plans a victory party for all the fighters and wants to include Monaka. Beerus fears Goku will learn the truth of his newest rival and tries to keep him from going. But when Monaka shows up, they’ll have to figure out a way to keep it all secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haran no Shukushoukai! Tsui ni Taiketsu!? Monaka tai Son Gokuu
The Victory Celebration of Chaos! They Battle at Last?! Monaka vs Son Goku
Tumult bei der Siegesfeier! – Kommt es nun zum Kampf zwischen Goku und Monaka?
波乱の祝勝会! 遂に対決!? モナカVS[たい]孫悟空

REGULAR.description:
Goku starts having trouble controlling his body and energy! After visiting with King Kai, he learns he’s on strict bed rest until his energy levels out. But when he goes to stay at Gohan’s, he finds taking it easy with baby Pan around isn’t so easy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku`s "Energy" Is Out of Control?! Caring For Pan Is a Handful
Gokus Qi ist außer Kontrolle! – Auf Pan aufzupassen ist harte Arbeit!
Gokuu no "Ki" ga Seigyo Funou!? Pan no Osewa de Shikuhakku
悟空の「気」が制御不能!? パンのお世話で四苦八苦

REGULAR.description:
After getting stuck in Monaka’s truck, Goten and Trunks wind up on Planet Pot-au-feu. Here, they protect an old man and get caught in a fight over…water?! But the truth about this water could leave them high and dry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Siegel des Planeten Potaufeu! – Das Geheimnis des übermenschlichen Wassers!
Planet Potaufeu`s Seal. The Secret of the "Superhuman Water" Unleashed!
Potofu Sei no Fuuin: Tokihanatareta "Choujinsui" no Himitsu!
ポトフ星の封印 解き放たれた"超人水"の秘密!

REGULAR.description:
After being drained of his energy, Vegeta and the others escape and learn more about the Superhuman Water. And if they don’t stop the clones, Vegeta could disappear—for good! With time running out, will Gotenks be enough to stop them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vegeta ga Kieru!? Fukusei Vegeta no Kyoui!
Vegeta verblasst! – Der Schrecken des duplizierten Vegetas!
Vegeta`s Disappearing?! The Threat of the Cloned Vegeta!
ベジータが消える!? 複製ベジータの脅威!

REGULAR.description:
As Vegeta begins to disappear, Goku faces the duplicate Vegeta! But can he defeat the copy and save the original before he vanishes? And when the fight starts, is Vegeta rooting for…his clone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Vegetas Kopie! – Wer wird gewinnen?
Goku vs. the Cloned Vegeta! Which One Will Win?!
Gokuu tai Fukusei Vegeta! Katsu no wa Docchi Da!?
悟空VS[たい]複製ベジータ! 勝つのはどっちだ!?

REGULAR.description:
Life in the present may be peaceful but trouble is stirring in the future! Trunks is risking everything to get back to the past to find help. But will he escape the new evil that threatens the future in time to get help from our heroes?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An SOS from the Future! A Dark New Enemy Emerges!!
Mirai kara no SOS! Kuroki Arata na Teki Arawaru!!
SOS aus der Zukunft! – Ein neuer, dunkler Feind erscheint!
未来からのSOS! 黒き新たな敵現る!!

REGULAR.description:
With barely enough time to stop the dark entity that’s after him, Trunks travels back to the past. But when he arrives, can present Trunks handle seeing his future self?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es gibt wieder Hoffnung! – Öffne deine Augen im Jetzt, Trunks!
HOPE[きぼう]!! 再び 現在[いま]で目覚めよトランクス
Hope!! Once More Awaken in the Present, Trunks
Kibou!! Futatabi: Ima de Mezameyo Trunks

REGULAR.description:
After regaining consciousness, Future Trunks describes how he came to arrive in the present. But apparently not even the gods are allowed to meddle with the past. Bulma and Future Trunks might have a bit of explaining to do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Message from the Future: Goku Black Strikes!
Eine Nachricht aus der Zukunft! – Goku Black greift an!
Mirai kara no Message: Gokuu Black Shuurai!
未来からのメッセージ ゴクウブラック襲来!

REGULAR.description:
Black suddenly appears from a mysterious portal. Goku sees this as an opportunity to test his look-alike’s power firsthand. But while the battle rages on, Black glances at the time machine with a sinister look in his eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Black! – Der Weg zur verschlossenen Zukunft!
Goku vs Black! The Closed Path to the Future
Gokuu tai Black! Tozasareta Mirai e no Michi
悟空VS[たい]ブラック! 閉ざされた未来への道

REGULAR.description:
Bulma gets to work repairing the old time machine that she’s kept. Meanwhile, Future Trunks recalls his experiences with Mai. But two questions remain: why does Black have a time ring? And what’s the extent of his power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feelings That Travel Beyond Time: Trunks and Mai
Liebe, die die Zeit überwindet! – Trunks und Mai!
Toki o Koeta Omoi: Trunks to Mai
時をこえた想い トランクスとマイ

REGULAR.description:
Repairs on the time machine continue, so Future Trunks goes to visit an old friend. However, times have changed, and the reunion isn’t quite what he expected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitei Saikai: Son Gohan to "Mirai" Trunks
Teacher and Student Reunited: Son Gohan and "Future" Trunks
Wiedersehen von Lehrer und Schüler! – Gohan und Trunks aus der Zukunft!
師弟再会 孫悟飯と"未来"トランクス

REGULAR.description:
The nature of Black’s power remains a mystery, so Whis, Beerus, and Goku go to the 10th Universe to find answers. Will challenging an apprentice Supreme Kai really help with the investigation? Goku seems to think so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black no Shoutai o Abake! Iza Dai 10 Uchuu no Kaiou Shinkai e!
Enthülle Blacks wahre Identität! – Auf zur Welt der Kaioshin des zehnten Universums!
Uncover Black`s Identity! To the Sacred World of the Kais!
ブラックの正体を暴け! いざ第10宇宙の界王神界へ!

REGULAR.description:
The time machine repairs are finishing up. Vegeta and Future Trunks go training, but the extent of Vegeta’s power is unlike anything Future Trunks has ever seen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der das Blut der Saiyajin in seinen Adern trägt! – Trunks` Entschluss!
Saiyajin no Chi o Hiku Mono: Trunks no Ketsui
The One Who Inherits the Saiyan Blood: Trunk`s Resolve
サイヤ人の血をひく者 トランクスの決意

REGULAR.description:
Zeno demands to meet with Goku and asks him for something very odd. Meanwhile in the 10th Universe, Zamasu’s hatred for humans grows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to See Son Goku: Zen-Oh Sama`s Summoning!
Ich will Goku treffen, ne? – Eine Audienz bei König Zen-Oh!
Son Gokuu ni Aitai no ne: Zen`ou-sama kara no Yobidashi!
孫悟空に会いたいのね 全王様からのよびだし!

REGULAR.description:
Future Trunks, Vegeta, and Goku finally use the time machine with intention to confront Black. But when they arrive, they’re greeted by a familiar face and an unfamiliar power. Will they be able to stand up to this new threat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rematch with Goku Black! Super Saiyan Rose Appears
Rückkampf mit Goku Black! – Auftritt des Super-Saiyajin Rosé!
Saisen Gokuu Black! Super Saiyajin Rose Toujou
再戦ゴクウブラック! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ロゼ登場

REGULAR.description:
With Vegeta out of the fight, Goku and Future Trunks must fight Future Zamasu and Black with a man down. But can they hope to defeat an opponent who brushes off even the strongest attacks?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Gott im unsterblichen Körper! – Zamasu steigt herab!
Fujimi no Karada o Motsu Kami: Zamasu Kourin
The God with the Immortal Body: Zamasu Descends
不死身の体を持つ神 ザマス降臨

REGULAR.description:
Zamasu’s mind is wandering down a dark path. Goku and Whis think they’ve solved the riddle regarding his and Black’s strength. His malice may be unnoticed now, but Zamasu’s ill will is beginning to dismantle his innocent facade!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zamasu and Black: The Mystery of the Two Deepens
Zamasu to Black: Fukumaru Futari no Nazo
Zamasu und Black! – Das Rätsel wird immer größer!
ザマスとブラック 深まる二人の謎

REGULAR.description:
Supreme Kai Gowasu is in grave danger! Now that gods are involved, Zamasu’s treachery isn’t a mortal matter anymore. Beerus will have to take matters into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beschütze den Kaioshin Gowasu! – Und zerstöre Zamasu!
Kaioushin Gowasu o Mamore: Zamasu o Hakai Seyo!
Protect Supreme Kai Gowasu: Destroy Zamasu!
界王神ゴワスを守れ ザマスを破壊せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Beerus is convinced that his actions should’ve influenced the future, but Future Trunks isn’t so sure! Now it’s time for Goku, Vegeta, and Future Trunks to see for themselves—and Bulma is going, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to the Future: Goku Black`s Identity Is Revealed!!
Es geht wieder in die Zukunft! – Blacks wahre Identität kommt ans Licht!
Futatabi Mirai e: Akasareru Gokuu Black no Shoutai!!
再び未来へ 明かされるゴクウブラックの正体!!

REGULAR.description:
The future is unchanged, Black isn’t what Goku had initially thought, and the situation has escalated to something more severe. With this new information, will the Saiyan trio fare better than before?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zamasu no Yabou: Katarareru Kyoufu no "Ningen 0 Keikaku"
Zamasu`s Ambition: The Awful "Zero Mortal Plan" Is Revealed
Zamasus Plan! – Der Schrecken einer Welt ohne Menschen!
ザマスの野望 語られる恐怖の「人間0計画」

REGULAR.description:
Fighting rages on, and things are looking grim for our heroes. They might not be able to win, but Future Trunks can at least defend the others while they escape! Time is running out, but a new strategy may be the key to victory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt beschütze ich! – Trunks` gewaltige Wutexplosion!
I`ll Protect the World! Trunks` Furious Super Power Explodes!!
Sekai wa Ore ga Mamoru! Trunks Ikari no Super Power Sakuretsu!
世界はオレが守る! トランクス怒りの超[スーパー]パワー炸裂!!

REGULAR.description:
Future Trunks challenges Black and Future Zamasu on his own. Goku, Vegeta, and Bulma hurry back to save him, but upon arrival, the time machine is damaged! This time the Saiyan prince is itching to dish out some payback!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Stärke eines wahren Saiyajin! - Vegetas heldenhafter Kampf!
Don`t Disrespect Saiyan Cells! Vegeta`s Heroic Battle Begins!!
Saiyajin no Saibou o Kegasuna! Vegeta no Souzetsu Battle Kaien!!
サイヤ人の細胞を汚すな! ベジータの壮絶バトル開演!!

REGULAR.description:
Vegeta’s rage inspires Black to draw upon his own anger and unleash a devastating new ability. Mortal arrogance is proving to be a large enough thorn in Future Zamasu’s side that a permanent decision must be made!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Agame yo! Tatae yo! Gattai Zamasu Bakutan!!
Lobet und Preiset ihn! - Die Urknallgeburt des fusionierten Zamasu!
Revere Him! Praise Him! Fusion Zamasu`s Explosive Birth!!
崇めよ! 讃えよ! 合体ザマス爆誕!!

REGULAR.description:
Zamasu and Black merge into an immortal being with limitless power. Is this the end of Future Trunks’ world? Is there any hope left for a victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das jüngste Gericht! - Die ultimative Kraft des Super-Gottes!
Is This the Final Judgement?! The Ultimate Power of the Absolute God
Saigo no Shinpan ka!? Zettaishin no Kyuukyoku no Power
最後の審判か!? 絶対神の究極の力[パワー]

REGULAR.description:
Merged Zamasu’s immortality is limited! Vegeta and Goku ask the Supreme Kais for help. Will their combined strength prevail over such a significant threat? Is this the chance for Future Trunks to get his revenge?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Entscheidungskampf! - Die wunderbare Kraft der Unbeugsamen!
Kessen! Akiramenai Senshi-tachi no Kiseki no Power
The Climactic Battle! The Miraculous Power of a Relentless Warrior!
決戦! あきらめない戦士たちの奇跡の力[パワー]

REGULAR.description:
Merged Zamasu’s ashes rises a universe encompassing darkness. Out of energy and out of options, Goku needs some help, and fast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata na Kibou!! o Mune ni: Saraba Trunks
Mit neuer Hoffnung im Herzen: Lebe Wohl, Trunks!
With New Hope!! in Our Hearts: Farewell, Trunks
新たなHOPE[きぼう]!!を胸に さらばトランクス

REGULAR.description:
Bulma tries to secretly build a time machine despite Beerus’ disapproval. Meanwhile, Goku gathers the Dragon Balls to revive King Kai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Forth, Shenron! Whose Wish Will Be Granted?!
Erscheine, Shenlong! - Wessen Wunsch wird erfüllt?
Ide yo Shenron! Kanaeru Negai wa Dare no Mono!?
いでよ神龍[シェンロン]! 叶える願いは誰のもの!?

REGULAR.description:
During an invention award show that Bulma is attending, a robot girl named Arale crashes the party. Tricked by the spectral Dr. Mashirito, she has an incredible urge to play and won’t let Saiyans get in her way! How can Goku and Vegeta defeat an opponent who blissfully ignores the laws of physics?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Arale! - Zerstört ihr verrückter Kampf die Erde?
Goku vs Arale! A Ridiculous Battle Will End the Earth?!
Gokuu tai Arale! Hachamecha Battle de Chikyuu ga Owaru!?
悟空VS[たい]アラレ! ハチャメチャバトルで地球が終わる!?

REGULAR.description:
Champa really wants delicious Earth food, and what better way to convince Beerus to let him visit than with a friendly game of baseball? But when the thrill of competition heats up, “friendly” could turn to deadly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Champa kara no Chousenjou! Kondo wa Yakyuu de Shoubu Da!!
Champa`s Challenge! This Time We Fight with Baseball!
Eine Herausforderung von Champa! – Dieses Mal messen wir uns beim Baseball!
シャンパからの挑戦状! 今度は野球で勝負だ!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku is convinced someone is trying to kill him, and he’s ready to fight for his life. However, can Goku withstand an assassination attempt from the brutally efficient Hit?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku strirbt! - Der Mordauftrag mit Erfolgsgarantie!
Gokuu Shisu! Zettai Shikkou no Ansatsu Irai
The Death of Goku! The Guaranteed Assassination Mission
悟空死す! 絶対執行の暗殺依頼

REGULAR.description:
After cleverly saving himself from an instant death, Goku is itching to find out the nature of Hit’s abilities. Will Goku’s deductions prevent his untimely destruction?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hangeki Naruka!? Mienai Koroshi no Waza!!
Kommt es zum Gegenangriff? - Die unsichtbare Todestechnik!
Will There Be a Counterattack?! The Invisible Killing Strike!!
反撃なるか!? 見えない殺しの技!!

REGULAR.description:
Gohan accepts an opportunity to be a stunt double in the Great Saiyaman movie. But keeping his identity as the real Great Saiyaman a secret will be difficult when there’s a parasitic alien floating around town!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gohan no Sainan! Great Saiyaman Masaka no Eigaka!?
Gohan`s Misfortune! An Unexpected Great Saiyaman Movie?!
Gohans Unglück! - Der große Saiyaman wird verfilmt!
悟飯の災難! グレートサイヤマンまさかの映画化!?

REGULAR.description:
Barry, the self-absorbed actor, tries to undermine Gohan’s reputation! But when the parasite chooses Barry as its host, it’s not just Gohan who’s in trouble. With the main actor under alien control, can Gohan save both the city and the movie?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Suru Mono no Tame ni! Fukutsu no Great Saiyaman!!
For the Ones He Loves! The Unbeatable Great Saiyaman!!
Für Jene, die er liebt! - Der große Saiyaman lässt sich nicht unterkriegen!
Pelos que Ele Ama! O Imbatível Grande Saiyaman!!
愛するもののために! 不屈のグレートサイヤマン!!

REGULAR.description:
Everyone is too busy to spar with Goku, so he seeks out Krillin for old times’ sake. Disappointed in his current combat ability, Krillin decides that he’s in dire need of retraining.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku and Krillin: Back to the Old Training Grounds
Goku e Kuririn: De volta para o antigo campo de treinamento
Goku und Krillin! - Das Training an alter Stätte!
Gokuu to Krillin: Natsukashi no Shugyou no Ba e
悟空とクリリン 懐かしの修行の場へ

REGULAR.description:
Upon entering a strange cave, Krillin and Goku are confronted by enemies from their past. Can Krillin find the courage to defeat them, or is history destined to repeat itself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Besiege deine Angstgegner! - Krillin findet seinen Kampfgeist wieder!
Defeat These Terrifying Enemies! Krillin`s Fighting Spirit Returns!
Derrote esses Inimigos Terríveis! O espírito de luta de Kuririn retorna!
Kyouteki o Uchiyabure! Krillin no Toushi Futatabi!
強敵を打ち破れ! クリリンの闘志ふたたび!

REGULAR.description:
The Tournament of Power has been on the back burner for a while. Bored of day-to-day work and tired of waiting, Goku convinces Zeno to get the ball rolling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Do It, Zen-Oh Sama! The All-Universe Martial Arts Tournament!!
Mach schon, König Zen-Oh! – Das Turnier der Universen!
Vamos Nessa, Senhor Zen`Ou! O Torneio de Artes Marciais entre Todos os Universos!!
Yarouze Zen`ou-sama! Uchuuichi Budoukai!!
やろうぜ全王様! 宇宙一武道会!!

REGULAR.description:
It’s official, the Tournament of Power is announced. There’s just one problem: the losers of the tournament will have their universes erased! To introduce his future self to the joys of martial arts, Zeno calls for an exhibition match between the 7th and 9th Universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Götter aller Universen sind schockiert! – Wer beim Turnier der Kraft verliert, wird ausgelöscht!
Os deuses de todos os universos em choque ?! Perdedores apagados no Torneio do Poder
The Gods of Every Universe in Shock?! Losers Erased in the Tournament of Power
Zen Uchuu no Kamisama mo Donbiki!? Maketara Shoumetsu "Chikara no Taikai"
全宇宙の神様もドン引き!? 負けたら消滅「力の大会」

REGULAR.description:
First round of the exhibition match is Basil versus Buu! With no energy signatures to hint at their power levels, the 9th Universe’s warriors could be much more powerful than they seem. But that won’t distract Buu from his playtime.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Basil, der Treter aus dem 9. Universum! – Besiege deinen Gegner, Boo!
Dai 9 Uchuu Keri no Basil vs Dai 7 Uchuu Majin Buu!!
Universe 9`s Basil the Kicker vs Universe 7`s Majin Buu!
第9宇宙蹴りのバジルVS第7宇宙魔人ブウ!!

REGULAR.description:
Gohan is up next. Out of practice and lacking knowledge of his opponent’s tactics, he’ll have to learn as he goes. But soon after the round begins, Gohan is forced to fight blind in more ways than one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awaken Your Sleeping Battle Spirit! Son Gohan`s Fight!!
Nemutta Toushi o Yobisamase! Son Gohan no Tatakai!!
Wecke den schlafenden Kampfgeist in dir! - Gohans Kampf!
眠った闘志を呼び覚ませ! 孫悟飯の闘い!!

REGULAR.description:
The 9th Universe’s third combatant tries to talk Zeno out of erasing losing universes. Zeno agrees on one condition: the 9th Universe must win the exhibition match. However, if Goku throws the fight, all universes will suffer the consequences!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bergamo der Zerquetscher gegen Goku! – Wer von ihnen verfügt über grenzenlose Kraft!
Bergamo the Crusher vs Son Goku! Which One Wields the Limitless Power?!
Tsubushi no Bergamo vs Son Gokuu! Aotenjou no Tsuyosa wa Docchi Da!?
潰しのベルガモVS孫悟空! 青天井の強さはどっちだ!?

REGULAR.description:
Insulted by Goku’s nonchalance regarding the Tournament of Power, a warrior from the 11th Universe challenges Goku to a battle for justice!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku wird nicht vergeben! – Toppo, der Kämpfer für Gerechtigkeit!
Never Forgive Son Goku! Toppo the Warrior of Justice Intrudes!!
Son Goku Yurusumaji! Seigi no Senshi Toppo Rannyuu!!
孫悟空許すまじ! 正義の戦士トッポ乱入!!

REGULAR.description:
Time to choose a roster for the Tournament of Power, but finding ten of the strongest fighters in the universe is no easy task! Meanwhile, Vegeta and Bulma’s child is close to being born.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 7 Uchuu Daihyou Team o Kessei Seyo! Saikyou no 10 Nin wa Dare Da!?
Form the Universe 7 Representing Team! Who Are the Strongest Ten?!
Stellt das Team des 7. Universums zusammen! – Wer sind die zehn stärksten Kämpfer?
第7宇宙代表チームを結成せよ! 最強の10人は誰だ!?

REGULAR.description:
Krillin must prove himself to both Gohan and Goku if he wants to enter the Tournament of Power. With martial arts tournament rules in play, Krillin’s strength isn’t solely based on his power level!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku, der Talentsucher! – Überrede Krillin und C18!
Scout Man Son Gokuu: Krillin to 18 Gou o Sasou
Son Goku the Recruiter Invites Krillin and No. 18
スカウトマン孫悟空 クリリンと18号を誘う

REGULAR.description:
Goku tries to find Android 17. In the meantime, the tournament stress is affecting the gods of each universe, causing them to bicker among themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Universen stellen sich auf! – Ein Konflikt der Absichten!
The Universes Begin to Make Their Moves: Their Individual Motives
Ugokidasu Uchuu: Sorezore no Omowaku
動き出す宇宙 それぞれの思惑

REGULAR.description:
Android 17 has been busy. Not only has he started a family, but he’s been training as well. Will Goku see him as a worthwhile member of the team? And is he even interested in joining?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fists Cross for the First Time! Android #17 vs Son Goku!!
Hajimete Majiwaru Kobushi! Jinzouningen 17 Gou vs Son Gokuu!!
Zum ertsen Mal kreuzen sich die Fäuste! – Goku gegen den Cyborg C17!
初めて交わる拳! 人造人間17号VS孫悟空!!

REGULAR.description:
When intergalactic poachers threaten Android 17’s island, it’s up to Goku to help him save the animals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunt the Poachers! Goku and No. 17`s United Front!!
Jagt die Wilderer! – Goku und C17 kämpfen gemeinsam!
Mitsuryoudan o Kare! Gokuu to 17 Gou no Kyoutou!!
密猟団を狩れ! 悟空と17号の共闘!!

REGULAR.description:
Piccolo tries to retrain Gohan. But Gohan will have to draw from past experiences if he wants to reach his full potential.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gohan and Piccolo: Teacher and Pupil Clash in Max Training!
Gohan to Piccolo: Shitei Gekitotsu no Genkai Shugyou!
Piccolo und Gohan – Lehrer und Schüler beim ultimativen Training!
悟飯とピッコロ 師弟激突の限界修業!

REGULAR.description:
Goku finds the last two members for the Tournament of Power. But someone from Tien’s past interferes with the recruitment process.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Unknown Beauty Appears! The Tenshin-Style Dojo`s Mystery?!
Arawareta Nazo no Bijo! Tenshin Ryuu Doujo no Kai!?
Eine rätselhafte Schönheit erscheint! – Tenshinhans mysteriöses Dojo!
現れた謎の美女! 天津流道場の怪!?

REGULAR.description:
There’s time for a sparring match before the tournament. It’s an all-out fight between two Saiyans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koerubeki Kabe o Misuete! Gokuu vs Gohan
See the Wall That Must Be Passed! Goku vs Gohan
Überschreite alle Grenzen! – Goku gegen Gohan!
越えるべき壁を見据えて! 悟空VS悟飯

REGULAR.description:
The Zenos can hardly contain their excitement for the tournament to come. The participating universes are recruiting at different rates, so hopefully they can gather enough warriors before the deadline!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kachinokoru no wa Dono Uchuu Da!? Zokuzoku to Tsudou Saikyou no Senshi-tachi!!
Welches Universum wird siegen? – Die stärksten Krieger versammeln sich!
Which Universe Will Survive?! The Strongest Warriors Are Gathering!!
勝ち残るのはどの宇宙だ!? 続々と集う最強の戦士たち!!

REGULAR.description:
Buu is stuck in a hibernation-like sleep! Meanwhile in the 6th Universe, Cabba teaches Caulifla how to become a Super Saiyan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine Krise im 7. Universum! – Das Team ist nicht vollzählig!
Emergency Development! The Incomplete Ten Members!!
Kinkyuu Jittai Hassei! Sorowanai 10 Nin no Member!!
緊急実態発生! そろわない10人のメンバー!!

REGULAR.description:
The 7th Universe is desperate for a tenth member, so Goku seeks out Frieza as a potential candidate. In the 6th Universe, Cabba and Caulifla try to goad Kale into training with them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10 Ninme no Senshi wa Omee Da! Gokuu Freezer no Moto e!!
10人目の戦士はおめえだ! 悟空フリーザのもとへ!!
Der zehnte Kämpfer bist du! – Goku besucht Freezer!
You`re the Tenth Warrior! Goku Goes to See Frieza!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku meets with Fortuneteller Baba to resurrect Frieza. Will attempts on Frieza’s new life delay their return to the group?! With disqualification on the table, time is running out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aku no Teiou Fukkatsu! Demukaeru Nazo no Shikaku-tachi!?
Die Auferstehung des bösen Imperators! – Die rätselhaften Attentäter!
The Emperor of Evil Returns! A Reception of Mysterious Assassins?!
悪の帝王復活! 出迎える謎の刺客たち!?

REGULAR.description:
Ambushed and outnumbered, Frieza shows his strength. Can he be trusted, or will his psychopathic tendencies get the best of him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine Tat des Grauens! – Freezer verliert die Kontrolle!
Saikyou! Saiaku! Freezer Ooabare!!
The Worst! The Most Evil! Frieza`s Rampage!!
最凶! 最悪! フレーザ大暴れ!!

REGULAR.description:
The stage is set and the teams are ready. The universes finally gather in the World of the Void for the Tournament of Power!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Zeit ist gekommen! – Das Schicksal der Universen steht auf dem Spiel!
The Time Is Here! To the World of Void for the Fate of the Universe!!
Toki wa Kita! Uchuu no Meiun o Kake Mu no Sekai e!!
時はきた! 宇宙の命運をかけ無の世界へ!!

REGULAR.description:
Let the battle begin! With so many competitors on one stage, teamwork is in short supply. Going off alone could mean the elimination of some powerful warriors!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Kampf ums Überleben beginnt! – Vorhang auf für das Turnier der Kraft!
Ikinokore! Tsui ni Kaimaku "Chikara no Taikai"!!
Survive! The Tournament of Power Begins at Last!!
生き残れ! ついに開幕「力の大会」!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku finds himself facing most of Universe 9’s warriors by himself. But when Vegeta interjects, suddenly the playing field seems a lot more level!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aa Mujou! Zetsubou Suru Uchuu!!
Ach Vergänglichkeit! – Ein Universum verzweifelt!
Oh, Uncertainty! A Universe Despairs!!
あぁ無常! 絶望する宇宙!!

REGULAR.description:
The erasure of Universe 9 serves as a grim reminder that existence itself is at risk. When the dust settles, Krillin and No. 18 break out their spousal synergy against a combatant from Universe 4.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Misetsukero! Kuririn no Sokojikara!!
Show Them! Krillin`s True Power!!
Zeig sie uns! – Krillins verborgene Kraft!
見せつけろ! クリリンの底力!!

REGULAR.description:
Following Universe 7’s first loss, the fighting stage is starting to clear out. As ranks are thinned, Goku finds Caulifla and her protégée. But Goku and Caulifla’s dueling triggers a frenzied rage that will permanently alter the arena.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Bousou! Mezame Araburu Kyousenshi!!
Out of Control! The Savage Berserker Awakens!!
Total außer Kontrolle! – Eine wilde Berserkerin erwacht!
大暴走! 目覚め荒ぶる狂戦士!!

REGULAR.description:
Three Saiyans are cut off from their teams, so the Pride Troopers attack! As the Tournament of Power progresses, teamwork is proving to be a threateningly powerful tactic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Krieger der Gerechtigkeit kommen! – Der Kampf gegen die stolze Brigade!
Semarikuru Seigi no Senshi! Pride Troopers!!
The Impending Warriors of Justice! The Pride Troopers!!
迫りくる正義の戦士! プライド・トルーパーズ!!

REGULAR.description:
Brianne and her companions from Universe 2 reveal their more powerful forms. It’s time to see what they’re made of! Has No. 17 bitten off more than he can chew?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai no Chikara ga Daibakuhatsu!? Dai 2 Uchuu Majokko Senshi!!
Eine Explosion der Liebe! – Die Kriegerhexen des 2. Universums greifen an!
The Power of Love Explodes?! Universe 2`s Little Witch Warriors!!
愛の力が大爆発!? 第2宇宙の魔女っ子戦士!!

REGULAR.description:
Angered by the loss of their teammate but in no position to fight, the remaining warriors from Universe 2 retreat and regroup. Gohan and Piccolo face off against the last two fighters from Universe 10.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gohan yo Hijou Nare! Dai 10 Uchuu to no Kessen!!
Gohan, Show No Mercy! Showdown with Universe 10!!
Gohan, zeig keine Gnade! – Showdown mit dem 10. Universum!
悟飯よ非情なれ! 第10宇宙との決戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Universe 6’s Hit and Universe 11’s Dyspo clash at breakneck speed. Even Hit’s signature Time Skip is too slow to be effective against Dyspo! But when a second Pride Trooper intervenes on his teammate’s behalf, Goku arrives to tip the scales.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chouzetsu Kousoku Battle Boppatsu! Gokuu to Hit no Kyoudou Sensen!!
Ein Kampf in Überlichtgeschwindigkeit! – Goku und Hit an gemeinsamer Front!
The Ultimate High Speed Battle Begins! Goku and Hit Join Forces!!
超絶光速バトル勃発! 悟空とヒットの共同戦線!!

REGULAR.description:
The 4th Universe has it out for Master Roshi! Against multiple opponents, how will technique fare against power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Battle! Master Roshi`s Sacrifice!!
Ein erbitterter Kampf! – Muten Roshi gibt alles!
Funsen! Muten Roushi Inochi o Moyasu!!
奮戦! 武天老師命を燃やす!!

REGULAR.description:
The 4th Universe has it out for Master Roshi! Against multiple opponents, how will technique fare against power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Find Him! Death Match with an Invisible Attacker!!
Gefährliche Reflexionen! – Attacke des unsichtbaren Angreifers!
Mikiwamero! Sugatanaki Attacker to no Shitou!!
見極めろ! 姿なきアタッカーとの死闘!!

REGULAR.description:
There are 36 warriors left, and quality is beginning to overtake quantity. Since most of the 7th Universe’s fighters remain, the 4th Universe’s Frost is ready to pick a fight with them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: F will Rache! – Eine überaus tückische Falle!
Fukushuu no "F"! Shikakerareta Koukatsu na Wana!?
Revenge "F"! The Cunning Trap?!
復讐の「F」! しかけられた狡猾な罠!?

REGULAR.description:
While Goku is busy fighting Ribrianne, Gohan faces a fighter from the 2nd Universe, and Frieza’s loyalty to the 7th Universe comes into question. What could Frieza possibly be planning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freezer to Frost! Majiwaru Akui!?
Freezer und Frost! – In Boshaftigkeit verbunden!
Frieza and Frost! Conjoined Malice?!
フリーザとフロスト! 交わる悪意!?

REGULAR.description:
Jiren finally confronts Goku and so begins a spectacle that will affect everyone on the battlefield!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokuu ni Semaru Saikyou no Teki! Imakoso Hanate! Hissatsu no Genkidama!!
The Ultimate Enemy Approaches Goku! Now, Let Loose! The Killer Spirit Bomb!!
Zusammenstoß mit dem ultimativen Gegner! – Zeit für die alles entscheidende Genkidama!
悟空に迫る最強の敵! 今こそ放て! 必殺の元気玉!!

REGULAR.description:
An awesome flash of light marks the end of Goku and Jiren’s clash. When the dust settles, what kind of power will rise from the ashes?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku lässt die Götter bangen! – Der neue Instinkt des Auferwachten!
Son Goku Wakes! New Level of the Awakened!!
Son Gokuu Kakusei! Mezameshi Mono no Aratanaru Gokui!!
孫悟空覚醒! 目覚めし者の新たなる極意!!

REGULAR.description:
With Goku out of the fight, Hit takes this opportunity to rid the field of its biggest threat. Maybe the key to Jiren’s downfall is time itself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ijigen no Kyokuchi Battle! Hit vs Jiren!!
Kampf in einer anderen Dimension! – Mit Hit gegen Jiren!
The Surreal Supreme Battle! Hit vs Jiren!!
異次元の極致バトル! ヒットVSジレン!!

REGULAR.description:
After their tough loss, it’s up to the three Saiyans of the 6th Universe to press onward. But with only half the time left and opportunistic fights cropping up across the arena, Cabba is on his last leg.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Saiyan`s Vow! Vegeta`s Resolution!!
Der Schwur des Saiyajin! – Vegetas Entschluss!
Saiyajin no Chikai! Vegeta no Kakugo!!
サイヤ人の誓い! ベジータの覚悟!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku is still recovering from his previous fight, but Caulifla has ambitions that only Goku can help her achieve. The two fighters quickly gain power in this Saiyan vs. Saiyan blitz!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiki Toshite! Sentoukyou Saiyajin Battle Futatabi!!
With Great Joy! The Repeat Battle-Crazy Saiyan Fight!!
嬉々として! 戦闘狂サイヤ人バトル再び!!

REGULAR.description:
Kale goes berserk in her and Caulifla’s fight with Goku. Power levels continue to grow in a duel that will push both parties to the limit!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Intimidating Passion! The Birth of a New Super Warrior!!
Kiki Semaru! Aratana Chou Senshi no Bakutan!!
鬼気せまる! 新たな超戦士の爆誕!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Kefla take center stage as fighting continues among the other universes. How will Goku’s stamina hold up against the multiplied strength of two fused Saiyans?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku vs Kefla! Super Saiyan Blue Defeated?!
Gokuu vs Kefla! Super Saiyajin Blue Yabureru!?
悟空VSケフラ! 超[スーパー]サイヤ人ブルー敗れる!?

REGULAR.description:
Goku and Kefla’s battle comes to a head! With Goku’s Ultra Instinct kicking in, Kefla must risk it all if she has any hope of defeating her opponent! Who will come out on top?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakuten no Kizashi! Migatte no Gokui ga Daibakuhatsu!!
The Sign of a Comeback! Ultra Instinct`s Huge Explosion!!
逆転の兆し! 身勝手の極意が大爆発!!

REGULAR.description:
With most of Goku’s stamina spent, fighters from the other universes rush to knock him out of the tournament. The 2nd Universe’s warriors of love are out for blood, and it’s up to the androids of the 7th Universe to stop them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai no Daikessen! Jinzouningen vs Dai 2 Uchuu!!
Showdown of Love! Androids vs Universe 2!!
愛の大決戦! 人造人間VS第2宇宙!!

REGULAR.description:
On the verge of annihilation and with only a few warriors left, the 2nd and 6th Universes are reinvigorated. Desire to win will push their fighters to new heights!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Accelerated Tragedy: Vanishing Universes...
Kasoku Suru Higeki: Kieyuku Uchuu...
加速する悲劇 消えゆく宇宙...

REGULAR.description:
As more and more universes drop out of existence, most of the remaining combatants are either strong or deceptive. The warriors from the 7th Universe are taken by surprise by hidden threats that are finally making themselves known!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaihi Funou!? Stealth Kougeki no Moui!!
Unavoidable?! The Fierce Stealth Attack!!
回避不能!? ステルス攻撃の猛威!!

REGULAR.description:
There are three universes left! The 3rd Universe’s strategy has worked well thus far, but how will it fare against Gohan, Goku, and Vegeta?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanpeki Naru Seizon Senryoku! Dai 3 Uchuu Kyoui no Shikaku!!
The Perfect Survival Tactic! Universe 3`s Menacing Assassin!!
完璧なる生存戦略! 第3宇宙脅威の刺客!!

REGULAR.description:
The 3rd Universe activates its secret final weapon! The 7th Universe will need to combine all their strength if they hope to defeat this quadruple-fused foe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All-Out War! The Ultimate Quadruple Merge vs Universe 7`s Full-Scale Attack!!
Souryokusen! Kyuukyoku no 4 Tai Gattai vs Dai 7 Uchuu Soukougeki!!
総力戦! 究極の4体合体VS第7宇宙総攻撃!!

REGULAR.description:
Only two universes remain! The strongest of the 7th Universe are pitted against the strongest of the 11th Universe. As the tournament nears its end, it’s time for the combatants to push themselves above and beyond!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For One`s Own Pride! Vegeta`s Challenge to Be the Strongest!!
Onore no Hokori o Kakete! Vegeta Saikyou e no Chousen!!
己の誇りをかけて! ベジータ最強への挑戦!!

REGULAR.description:
Jiren shrugs off even the strongest individual attacks! However, can the combined strength of Goku and Vegeta stand up against his immense power?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Body and Soul, Full Power Release! Goku and Vegeta!!
Zenshinzenrei Zenryoku Kaihou! Gokuu to Vegeta!!
全身全霊全力解放! 悟空とベジータ!!

REGULAR.description:
Frieza and Dyspo’s duel is accelerating out of control! As Frieza gets pushed back, Gohan enters the mix in hopes of getting a quick elimination.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shippuu Dotou no Moushuu! Gohan Haisui no Jin!!
The Fiercely Overwhelming Assault! Gohan`s Last Stand!!
疾風怒涛の猛襲! 悟飯背水の陣!!

REGULAR.description:
Because of the 7th Universe’s numbers advantage, Android 17 hopes to run out the clock. When Frieza comes over to provide support, Top is forced to rethink his motivations and will unleash a familiar destructive power!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ifuudoudou! Hakaishin Toppo Kourin!!
With Imposing Presence! God of Destruction Toppo Descends!!
威風堂々! 破壊神トッポ降臨!!

REGULAR.description:
Both sides are becoming more and more desperate. Top has given up everything to survive! Vegeta gives up nothing! In the end, who will be looking down on whom?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami o mo Koero! Vegeta Sutemi no Ichigeki!!
Surpass Even a God! Vegeta`s Desperate Blow!!
神をも超えろ! ベジータ捨て身の一撃!!

REGULAR.description:
Jiren is all that remains between the 7th Universe and victory. But with Frieza out for the count and Vegeta low on stamina, how will they compare to one who values strength above all else?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Semarikuru Shouheki! Kibou o Takushita Saigo no Barrier!!
The Approaching Wall! The Final Barrier of Hope!!
迫りくる障壁! 希望を託した最後のバリア!!

REGULAR.description:
Following Android 17’s sacrifice, the remaining Saiyans need time to recover. As Goku rests, Vegeta takes it upon himself to challenge Jiren one on one!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedakai Hokori Saigo made! Vegeta Chiru!!
Noble Pride to the End! Vegeta Falls!!
気高い誇り最後まで! ベジータ散る!!

REGULAR.description:
Once again, Goku ascends to new heights. As Ultra Instinct takes over, now it’s a matter of whether surpassing his own limits is enough to surpass Jiren!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai Chouzetsu Toppa! Migatte no Gokui Kiwamaru!!
Limits Super Surpassed! Ultra Instinct Mastered!!
限界超絶突破! 身勝手の極意極まる!!

REGULAR.description:
Goku fights for everyone dear to him. Jiren fights only for himself. Overwhelmed and on the verge of defeat, Jiren’s resolve is reignited. He’ll stop at nothing to prevent his past from repeating!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuuzenzetsugo no Chou Kessen! Kyuukyoku no Survival Battle!!
The Greatest Showdown of All Time! The Ultimate Survival Battle!!
空前絶後の超決戦! 究極のサバイバルバトル!!

REGULAR.description:
